name: The Pest (itch)
description:
The Pest is an arcade game about a little rabbit trying to survive in a wolf-ruled world. Your goal is to steal wolf crops, but be careful because they surely won’t put a blind eye to your survival attempts.

How to play:

Try to steal crops to keep your tummy full. When you’re hungry you’re getting slower so think ahead where are you going to steal delicious veggies next.

 Remember wolves may be determined to punish you for theft but when you're far enough, they're gonna come back to their doggy families.

Veggies values:

Carrot - 50

Cabbage – 40

Beetroot - 30

 

Controls

WSAD or Arrows – Movement

Credits:

Julia Kucharska - Kucharaka

Jakub Błaszczyk - littlelenim

Gosia Klasa - megi 

Try to beat ours in-game scores ;3
